name: ITX 215.01.E - PAYE Withheld Part 2
query:
select min(ss.start_date) as "Start Date:Date:120", max(ss.end_date) as "End Date:Date:120", ss.employee_name as "Employee Name:Data:180", sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'Basic', ifnull(sd.amount,0), 0)) as "Basic Salary::100", sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'Housing', ifnull(sd.amount,0), 0)) as "Housing::100", sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'TI', ifnull(sd.amount,0), 0)) as "Other Allw
& Benefits::100", sum(ss.gross_pay) as "Gross Pay::100", sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'NSSF', ifnull(sd.amount,0), 0)) as "NSSF::100", sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'PAYE', sd.amount, 0)) as "PAYE:Float:100", ss.company as "Company::180" from `tabSalary Slip` ss left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sd on sd.parent = ss.name where ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s and ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s group by ss.employee_name having sum(ss.gross_pay) > 0
